doc.field: - Net 190.9 mln Swiss francs vs 150.4 mln Turnover 5.24 billion vs 5.38 billion Dividend 160 per bearer vs 155 francs, 32 francs per registered vs 31 francs, 16 francs per participation certificate vs 15.50 francs Cash flow 294.3 mln vs 242.6 mln Note - Confirms forecast of results issued in January. Operating profit 337.6 mln vs 265 mln Depreciation 103.4 mln, up 12.2 pct Capital spending 84.6 mln, down 15.7 pct.
